str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A plank, board. Of uncertain affinity; a plank.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From dia and sozo; to save thoroughly, i.e. to cure, preserve, rescue, etc.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
